# sds-avatar-group



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                                | Type                                                                            | Default |
| --------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------- |
| `max`     | `max`     | The max number of avatars to show, the rest will be hidden | `number`                                                                        | `3`     |
| `spacing` | `spacing` | The spacing between avatars                                | `"100" \| "200" \| "300" \| "negative-100" \| "negative-200" \| "negative-300"` | `'200'` |
